com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.toasts

Class DynamicHint.Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.toasts.DynamicHint.Config
  • Enclosing class:
    DynamicHint

    public static class DynamicHint.Config
extends Object
    Configuration class to customise the DynamicHint attributes.
